products.title: Office Pro Vending Machine
products.description: A fully automatic, multi-option coffee vending machine perfect for office spaces. Serves espresso, cappuccino, and lattes with a single touch.

products.title: CafeExpress Compact Vender
products.description: Compact and efficient, this machine is ideal for small cafes and restaurants. Offers 4 beverage options and requires minimal maintenance.

products.title: Bean-to-Cup Commercial Vending
products.description: High-capacity, bean-to-cup machine that grinds fresh coffee for every cup. Features a digital display and cashless payment options.

products.title: InstaCuppa Hot & Cold Vending
products.description: Versatile machine that dispenses both hot coffee beverages and cold coffee options. Perfect for canteens and large waiting areas.

products.title: QuickBrew Tabletop Machine
products.description: A simple, user-friendly tabletop coffee vending machine with 3 premix options. Ideal for small offices and reception areas.

products.title: Corporate Deluxe Vending
products.description: Premium vending solution with a sleek design, touch screen interface, and over 10 beverage selections including specialty coffees.

products.title: V60 Cone Filter Papers (100-Pack)
products.description: High-quality, disposable paper filters designed for V60 drippers. Ensures a clean, sediment-free brew with optimal extraction.

products.title: Chemex Bonded Filters (100-Pack)
products.description: Thicker, pre-folded circle filters designed specifically for Chemex brewers to remove impurities, oils, and grounds.

products.title: Aeropress Micro-Filters (350-Pack)
products.description: Official micro-filters for the Aeropress coffee maker. Removes grit for a smoother cup of coffee. Comes in a pack of 350.

products.title: Baratza Encore Conical Burr Grinder
products.description: An excellent entry-level electric burr grinder with 40 individual grind settings, perfect for everything from French press to espresso.

products.title: Timemore C2 Manual Grinder
products.description: A high-quality manual coffee grinder with stainless steel conical burrs. Portable and precise, ideal for pour-over and Aeropress enthusiasts.

products.title: Frost Latte
products.description: A refreshing and creamy iced latte, perfectly chilled and topped with a light, frothy milk foam. The ideal cold coffee to beat the heat.

products.title: Vanilla Frost
products.description: A smooth and sweet blended cold coffee infused with rich vanilla bean flavor, topped with a swirl of whipped cream. A delightful frosty treat.

products.title: Caffora Brew Dark
products.description: Our signature dark roast, brewed to perfection. This coffee offers a bold, intense flavor with notes of dark chocolate and a smoky finish.

products.title: Caffora Mist
products.description: A balanced and smooth coffee featuring our classic brew topped with a layer of steamed, frothy milk. A gentle and comforting choice.

products.title: Caffora Mist Chocolate
products.description: The comforting Caffora Mist, elevated with a rich swirl of premium chocolate syrup. A perfect blend of coffee and cocoa.

products.title: Iced Brew
products.description: Our classic house brew, chilled over ice for a crisp and invigorating coffee experience. Simple, refreshing, and full-bodied.

products.title: Caramel Swirl
products.description: A decadent latte with sweet caramel syrup swirled into rich espresso and steamed milk, finished with a caramel drizzle.

products.title: Spincelere
products.description: An exotic blend of our signature espresso infused with a secret mix of warm spices, including cinnamon and nutmeg, for a uniquely tantalizing flavor.

products.title: Caffora Brew
products.description: Our signature medium roast house blend. A well-rounded and smooth cup with a balanced flavor profile, perfect for any time of day.

products.title: Minimalist Ceramic Mug (White)
products.description: A simple and elegant ceramic mug with a clean design and a comfortable handle. Your perfect everyday companion for any beverage.

products.title: Cappuccino Cup with Saucer
products.description: A wide-mouthed ceramic cup, ideal for serving a classic cappuccino with plenty of foam. Comes with a matching saucer.

products.title: Handmade Stoneware Tea Cup
products.description: A rustic, handle-less stoneware cup perfect for tea or coffee. Its earthy texture provides a comfortable and warm grip.

products.title: Double-Walled Glass Cup
products.description: This insulated glass cup keeps your drink hot while the exterior remains cool to the touch. Features a sleek, modern floating effect.

products.title: Tall Iced Coffee Glass
products.description: A tall, elegant glass with a heavy base, perfectly shaped for serving iced lattes, cold brew, and other chilled coffee creations.

products.title: Irish Coffee Glass Mug
products.description: A classic stemmed glass mug, traditionally used for Irish coffee but also great for lattes and hot chocolate.

products.title: Mason Jar Mug with Lid & Straw
products.description: A trendy and versatile mason jar mug with a handle, metal lid, and reusable straw. Ideal for iced coffees and smoothies.

products.title: Classic Espresso Cup
products.description: A small, traditional ceramic cup designed to hold a single or double shot of rich espresso. Perfect for savoring intense coffee flavors.

products.title: Stainless Steel Travel Mug
products.description: A durable, insulated travel mug with a spill-proof lid. Keeps your coffee hot for hours, making it perfect for your daily commute.

products.title: Enamel Camping Mug
products.description: Lightweight and durable, this retro-style enamel mug is built for adventure. Ideal for camping, hiking, or a rustic feel at home.

products.title: Jumbo Soup & Coffee Mug
products.description: An oversized ceramic mug with a large capacity, perfect for those who like a generous serving of coffee, soup, or cereal.

products.title: Matte Black Modern Mug
products.description: A stylish and sophisticated mug with a smooth matte black finish. Its modern aesthetic elevates your coffee-drinking experience.

products.title: Hand-Painted Artisan Mug
products.description: A unique, one-of-a-kind mug, individually hand-painted by local artisans. A beautiful piece of functional art.

products.title: Clear Glass Coffee Mug
products.description: Enjoy the beautiful layers of your latte or cappuccino with this elegant and sturdy clear glass mug.

products.title: 'But First, Coffee' Graphic Mug
products.description: Start your day with a smile. This fun ceramic mug features a playful 'But First, Coffee' graphic, perfect for any coffee lover.

products.title: Color-Changing Magic Mug
products.description: Pour in a hot beverage and watch as a hidden design magically appears! A fun and surprising gift for friends and family.

products.title: Set of 4 Stackable Mugs
products.description: Save counter space with this clever set of four ceramic mugs that nestle perfectly into each other. Comes with a metal stand.

products.title: Rustic Stoneware Mug
products.description: Featuring a speckled glaze and an earthy, robust feel, this stoneware mug brings a touch of rustic charm to your morning ritual.
